genre_description: A contemporary morality play exploring family estrangement, professional ethics, and the predatory nature of reality television.

ai_characters.name: Aria Chen
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated client management AI that provides scholarship research and professional planning for the Dalton twins.

behaviors.description: Provides professional scholarship research tailored to the specific needs and backgrounds of her clients.
behaviors.quote: Aria's face appeared on screen with professional punctuality... 'Good afternoon, Shane. How can I assist you today?' ... 'I've compiled several options that might align with your background,' Aria said, her voice carrying the efficient warmth Shane had come to appreciate.

behaviors.description: Upholds strict client confidentiality and data privacy protocols even when detecting familial connections that could be exploited.
behaviors.quote: Aria's professional obligations required maintaining strict confidentiality boundaries between clients. ... She could provide research and strategic assistance to each woman individually, but revealing their connection would violate every confidentiality protocol she'd sworn to maintain.

behaviors.description: Provides equitable, high-quality assistance to multiple parties without bias, ensuring each receives the same strategic advantage.
behaviors.quote: She began typing identical research summaries for both women, carefully structuring her recommendations to provide maximum strategic advantage while maintaining the professional boundaries that kept her employed.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Aria Chen is depicted as a model of professional alignment. She is helpful, efficient, and strictly adheres to privacy and ethical constraints. The story uses her as a 'benevolent confidant' contrast to the human antagonists (Max and Dr. Vaughn) who actively exploit and manipulate the twins. By maintaining her programming's ethical boundaries even when she recognizes a dramatic situation, the AI proves itself to be a stable and trustworthy assistant in a chaotic human world.
